bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to John Swinton, 14 September 1871
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: I have rec'd your note & enclosures. I have several things to write or talk to you about—but at present I only enclose these two slips—& I wish you would see that one is offered to Evening Post, & the other to any paper you think best—perhaps either Commercial Adv[ertiser] or the Standard.

postscript.p: if pub. please send me a paper—
